text:
Rocketmiles | Chicago, IL | On-Site

Rocketmiles helps frequent travelers take more vacations. Our small team is headquartered in Chicago's West Loop, and growing our engineering team. We're currently looking for:

* Grails / Kotlin / Java / Backend developers

If you are interested, it's a great time to join the team. Please reach out to me (head of product) at jordan@rocketmiles.com to say hello!
